title: Scientific Publications | Mabuwaya Foundation
heroText: Explore peer-reviewed research and publications supported by the Mabuwaya Foundation on Philippine crocodile conservation, community-based efforts, and biodiversity studies.

publications.title: Conservation of the Philippine Crocodile
publications.authors: van Weerd, M., van der Ploeg, J. (2012)

ctaText: We welcome researchers and institutions to join us in advancing knowledge and conservation of the Philippine crocodile and its habitat.
